welcome_message_body: Welcome to Winston-Salem, a city known for its rich history, charming downtown, and vibrant arts scene. We invite you to explore our unique blend of tradition and innovation and enjoy everything this wonderful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: West End Cafe
restaurants.description: West End Cafe is a american restaurant located in Winston-Salem.
restaurants.address: 926 W 4th St (Brookstown Ave NW), Winston-Salem, NC 27101

restaurants.name: Mozelle's
restaurants.description: Mozelle's is a southern food restaurant located in Winston-Salem.
restaurants.address: 878 W 4th St (Summit St NW), Winston-Salem, NC 27101

restaurants.name: Burke Street Pizza Burke St
restaurants.description: Burke Street Pizza Burke St is a pizzeria located in Winston-Salem.

restaurants.name: Bobby Boy Bakeshop
restaurants.description: Bobby Boy Bakeshop is a bakery located in Winston-Salem.

restaurants.name: The Porch Kitchen & Cantina
restaurants.description: The Porch Kitchen & Cantina is a taco restaurant located in Winston-Salem.
restaurants.address: 840 Mill Works St (W Northwest Blvd), Winston-Salem, NC 27101

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Smith-Reynolds Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Smith-Reynolds Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Piedmont Triad International Airport houses all major airlines and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a smaller terminal at Piedmont Triad International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is a newer terminal at Piedmont Triad International Airport, featuring modern design and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
